sentences.en: A cigarette spark started the forest fire.
sentences.cn: 香烟的火星引起了这场森林火灾.

sentences.en: A discarded cigarette sparked a small brush fire.
sentences.cn: 一个乱扔的烟头引起了一场小小的灌木丛火灾。

sentences.en: A dropped cigarette may have sparked the fire.
sentences.cn: 一支丢弃的香烟可能引发了这场火灾。

sentences.en: A mischievous spark glinted in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼中闪现出一丝顽皮的神情。

sentences.en: A single spark can start a prairie fire.
sentences.cn: 星星之火,可以燎原.

sentences.en: A spark set the woods on fire.
sentences.cn: 星星之火使整个森林燃烧起来.

sentences.en: Even Oliver felt a tiny spark of excitement.
sentences.cn: 连奥利弗都感到一丝兴奋。

sentences.en: Furiously he tested the spark - plugs, stared at the commutator.
sentences.cn: 他气呼呼地测试着火花塞, 眼睛盯着转换器.

sentences.en: He passed an electric spark through a mixture of gases.
sentences.cn: 他让一束电火花穿过了一团混合气体。

sentences.en: His music lacked that vital spark of imagination.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐缺少非常关键的那一点灵感。

sentences.en: I think he would knock Bowe spark out.
sentences.cn: 我想他会把鲍威打昏的。

sentences.en: Some bright spark turned the heating off last night!
sentences.cn: 某个聪明过头的家伙昨晚把暖气关了。

sentences.en: sparks from the fire
sentences.cn: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.en: The ignition - distributor vacuum - advance mechanism advances the spark during part - throttle operation.
sentences.cn: 分电器点火真空提前装置在节气门部分开启期间,使火花提前发出.

sentences.en: The police response sparked outrage in the community.
sentences.cn: 警方的反应激起了民愤。

sentences.en: The proposals are expected to spark heated debate.
sentences.cn: 这些提议估计会引起激烈的争论。

sentences.en: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.cn: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

sentences.en: The spark ignited the gasoline to start the motor.
sentences.cn: 电花点燃汽油以发动马达.

sentences.en: The wires were sparking above me.
sentences.cn: 电线正在我头顶上方冒火花。

sentences.en: To a stoic, the human soul was a divine spark.
sentences.cn: 对于禁欲主义者来说，人的灵魂是神圣的火花。

sentences.en: We saw a spark of light through the trees.
sentences.cn: 我们透过树丛看到闪光.

sentences.en: What made the electric wire spark?
sentences.cn: 电线冒火花是什么原因?

words.tran_cn: 闪闪发光的，闪烁的；起泡沫的
电火花器；点火线圈；[海洋] 电火花震源；火花捕捉器
闪耀；发出火花；起泡沫（sparkle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 干得热火朝天；进行得非常热烈
n. 火花塞；带头人；中坚分子

phrases.phrase: strike sparks off each other (或 one another)
phrases.tran_cn: （两个或两个以上的人）相互启发

trans.tran_cn: 燃烧的颗粒，火星，火花，余火，（金属的）发光的颗粒，电火花
trans.tran_en: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
If a burning object or electricity sparks a fire, it causes a fire

trans.tran_cn: 发出火星，发出闪光，热烈赞同，正常运转
trans.tran_en: to produce sparks of fire or electricity

trans.tran_cn: 发动，触发，激起运动，鼓舞
